org.fluentjava
Class Fluency

java.lang.Object
  org.fluentjava.Fluency
Direct Known Subclasses:
FluencyDelegator
public abstract class Fluency
extends java.lang.Object

Class with no attributes that allows subclasses to easily create collections and closures, without import static. A lot of type inference to make things go more fluent. If you do not with to extend Fluency, FluentUtils with import static can be a good enough replacement.

See Also:
FluentUtils
